languages.text: "Я была так поглощена обретенной тишиной, что даже не поняла сначала, что это ты. Мне так жаль, Кибелла..."
"I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
languages.original_text: "Я была так поглощена обретенной тишиной, что даже не поняла сначала, что это ты. Мне так жаль, Кибелла..."

traits.locale_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
"I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
"I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
"I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
"I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

languages.text: "Ich war so in die neu gefundene Stille vertieft, dass ich zunächst gar nicht erkannt hatte, dass Ihr es seid. Es tut mir so leid, Kibellah ..."
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war so in die neu gefundene Stille vertieft, dass ich zunächst gar nicht erkannt hatte, dass Ihr es seid. Es tut mir so leid, Kibellah ..."

languages.text: « J'étais si absorbée par le silence naissant qu'au début, je n'ai même pas compris que c'était vous. Désolée, Kibellah... »
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais si absorbée par le silence naissant qu'au début, je n'ai même pas compris que c'était vous. Désolée, Kibellah... »

languages.text: «Estaba tan absorta en mi nuevo silencio que ni me di cuenta de que era usted al principio. Lo lamento, Kibellah...».
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

traits.locale_text: «Estaba tan absorta en mi nuevo silencio que ni me di cuenta de que era usted al principio. Lo lamento, Kibellah...».

languages.text: 「新しい沈黙にあまりにも飲み込まれていたものだから、お前だと気が付かなかったわ。悪かったわね、キベラ…」
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

traits.locale_text: 「新しい沈黙にあまりにも飲み込まれていたものだから、お前だと気が付かなかったわ。悪かったわね、キベラ…」

languages.text: “我实在是太沉浸在前所未有的沉静之中了，以致于一开始根本没意识到那个人是你。我很抱歉，绮贝菈……”
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

traits.locale_text: “我实在是太沉浸在前所未有的沉静之中了，以致于一开始根本没意识到那个人是你。我很抱歉，绮贝菈……”

languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."

languages.text: "Yeni keşfettiğim sükûnete kendimi o kadar kaptırmışım ki en başta senin olduğunu fark etmedim bile. Kusura bakma Kibellah..."
languages.original_text: "I was so engrossed in the newfound silence that I didn't even realise it was you at first. I'm so sorry, Kibellah..."
